responses: The college has a strong placement cell. Companies like Wipro, TCS, Infosys, Capgemini, and Tech Mahindra regularly visit for campus recruitment. You can find more on: https://nsakcet.ac.in/training-placement/

patterns: Does the college help with internships?
Can I get an internship through college?
responses: Yes! The college collaborates with industry partners to offer internships for both UG and PG students, especially in tech and management domains. The Training & Placement Cell can help you find the right fit.

patterns: What can students expect on campus?

patterns: Are there labs and a library?
responses: Yes! The campus has high-speed Wi-Fi, modern computer labs, departmental labs, and a rich library. The infrastructure supports both academic and extracurricular activities.
